abstracts.cdata!:
The credit will support the
            Government's attempt to expand agricultural export
            earnings through the rehabilitation of the irrigated
            agricultural sub-sector, and will encourage Government
            economic policy and institutional reforms. Specifically, it
            will: (a) provide financing for fertilizer, pesticides,
            herbicides, and jute sacks; (b) provide spare parts needed
            by the Rahad and Suki Irrigation schemes; (c) provide spare
            parts to the Sudan Railways Corporation to strengthen the
            agricultural transport system; and (d) finance studies in
            the agricultural sector.
